update_message:
- New song sorting system
- Sort by title, artist, album, year & more
- Tap sort button to flip order (A-Z / Z-A)
- Smart grouping: skips 'The', 'A', 'An' at start
- Accented letters sort correctly (é=e, ñ=n)
- Settings moved to clean modular design
- Faster sorting on large libraries
